titles.title: Directing the Joint Committee on the Library to procure a bust or statue of Sojourner Truth for placement in the Capitol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 04/15/1997--Introduced. Requires the Joint Committee on the Library to procure a bust or statue of Sojourner Truth and cause such item to be placed in a suitable location in the Capitol.
